name: ScreenSaver Display
objective: Built a cross platform desktop screensaver application that allows users to use their Instagram posts and use subreddit images as screensaver images.
technologiesUsed: Electron.js, React.js, Node.js, Instagram API, Reddit Search API, React Hooks, CSS/CSS modules, Lazy Loading Images

name: Simpsons Memory Game
objective: Built a carding-picking game with React.js based on the Simpson characters. Scores are stored in a MySQL DB.
technologiesUsed: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, REST API, MySQL, Amazon RDS, React Hooks, React Spring API, SCSS, Bootstrap

name: A_Connect (Forkaia Application)
objective: Developed the user and authentication back-end with Node.js, MongoDB, and JWTs. Linked the back-end to React.js front-end.
technologiesUsed: Node.js, Express.js, REST API, Mongo DB, JWT, React.js, Bootstrap

name: Django User Profile - Upload and Update
objective: Built a user profile web app (single user) in which the user can upload a profile pic and update his or her profile.
technologiesUsed: Django3, Python3, SQLite, REST API, Bootstrap 4, CSS, HTML

name: GTR High Performance
objective: Developed a new version of the GTR High Performance website with modern technologies and design.
technologiesUsed: React.js, Google Maps API, React Class Components, React Bootstrap, CSS, Yelp widgets

name: Synchronized Plus and Minus Buttons
objective: Built a plus and minus buttons component that are synchroizned with the help of a plugin.

name: Palindrome Checker
objective: Built a simple web app that tells user whether a provided word is a palindrome or not.
